scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --workspace=apps/api && npm install --workspace=apps/ui
scripts.build: npm run build --workspace=apps/api && npm run build --workspace=apps/ui
scripts.test: npm run test --workspace=apps/api && npm run test --workspace=apps/ui
scripts.lint: npm run lint --workspace=apps/api && npm run lint --workspace=apps/ui
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix --workspace=apps/api && npm run lint:fix --workspace=apps/ui
scripts.docker:rebuild: docker compose down && docker compose build --no-cache && docker compose up -d
scripts.db:reset: npm run api:migration:revert && npm run api:migration:run
